further-information-required.html_body:
Thank you for contacting us. We need some more information about your complaint.

{{ case.values.further_information_required.value }}

Please provide the additiional information via this link.  

Alternatively you can log in to view the details of your complaint via the following link https://cxmdemo.q.jadu.net/q/case/{{ case.reference }}/timeline and provide the information we have requested.

Many thanks

Customer Relations
further-information-required.subject: Please provide more information about your complaint
further-information-required.text_body:
Thank your for contacting us. We need some more information about your
complaint.

{{ case.values.further_information_required.value }}

Please provide the additiional information via this link
[https://xfpdemo.jadu.net/forms/form/12345/en/complaint_further_information?caseReference={{case.reference}} ].  

Alternatively you can log in to view the details of your complaint
via the following link https://cxmdemo.q.jadu.net/q/case/{{
case.reference }}/timeline
[https://cxmdemo.q.jadu.net/q/case/{{case.reference}}/timeline] and
provide the information we have requested.

Many thanks

Customer Relations
further-information-required.title: Further Information Required

complaint-acknowledgement.html_body:
Thank you for submitting a complaint.  Unless the Council contact you to ask for further information to clarify the nature of the complaint the Council now has 20 days to respond to your complaint.

You can log in to view the details of your complaint via the following link https://cxmdemo.q.jadu.net/q/case/{{ case.reference }}/timeline.

Many thanks

Customer Relations
complaint-acknowledgement.subject: Your Complaint Reference: {{case.reference}}
complaint-acknowledgement.text_body:
Thank you for submitting a complaint.  Unless the Council contact you
to ask for further information to clarify the nature of the complaint
the Council now has 20 days to respond to your complaint.

You can log in to view the details of your complaint via the
following link https://cxmdemo.q.jadu.net/q/case/{{ case.reference
}}/timeline
[https://cxmdemo.q.jadu.net/q/case/{{case.reference}}/timeline].

Many thanks

Customer Relations
complaint-acknowledgement.title: Complaint Acknowledgement

decision-stage-1.html_body:
Thank your for contacting us in relation to complaint reference: {{case.reference}}.

We have now assessed your complaint and the outcome is that your complaint was:

{{ case.values.stage_1_decision.label }}

{{ case.values.stage_1_outcome_action.label }}   {{ case.values.stage_1_financial_redress_amount.value }}

If you wish to appeal the decision then please follow the guidance on our website and complete this form 

 

Many thanks

Customer Relations
decision-stage-1.subject: Your Complaint Decision
decision-stage-1.text_body:

{{case.reference}}.
